title: Expense Tracker
description: Woke up one day and decided to act like an adult, built an expense tracker to stop wasting money on useless things like groceries.

title: Manufacturer's Online Showroom
description: Created a Vue.js SPA to put the company online and give clients a clear, visual look at product samples.

title: This very Portfolio
description: A responsive portfolio website built with Vue.js

title: E-commerce Platform
description: My proudest project so far, a full-featured e-commerce platform for wholesalers, handling content creation (blogging), client management, products, brands, automated mailing, and more. all powered by Django.

title: Content Management System
description: A content management website I built for my final year project, powered by Wagtail.

title: Chat Application
description: An exploration sandbox diving into headless frameworks: DRF (JWT, serialization, media/static file management), Vue with Axios, Pinia, and other plugins. Also built a live chatroom using WebSockets between the two.

title: Django Starter
description: A maximalist Django 5.2 starter packed with optional Bootstrap 5.3, Font Awesome 6, theme toggle, full settings, demo templates, and handy quality-of-life features.

title: Electron js Starter
description: A minimalist setup to quickly scaffold an Electron app using Vue 3 and TypeScript.
